_header: Bloodless and boneless blood had none bone
_description: On the Host — four monorhyming lines

HerefordO414.Transcription:
Blodles & bonles blod had non bonffadur had fadur þat ffadur
                    had non Þe werk & werkmon hoe ben alonHe þat neuer ne
                    ede ffyrryst had ygon
HerefordO414.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.446.
